approaches.title: Bitwise and List
approaches.blurb: Use the index of list items to represent the bit position of the allergy.

approaches.title: Bitwise and Dict
approaches.blurb: Use the key in a Dict to represent the bit position of the allergy.

approaches.title: Bitwise and case expression
approaches.blurb: Use a case expression to return the bit position of the allergy.

approaches.title: Bitwise, List and type alias
approaches.blurb: Use a type alias to represent the bit position of the allergy.
